title: Arsenal vs Standard Liege: Player ratings
text:
Arsenal hammered Standard Liege at home in a Europa League win in which their young players and summer signings shone.

It took 18-year-old Brazilian striker Gabriel Martinelli just thirteen minutes to open the scoring with a header, and three minutes later he grabbed his second.

20-year-old English prospect Joe Willock then got in on the act, adding the third inside the opening half-hour.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Arsenal dominated the rest of the match and scored their fourth midway through the second-half, with Dani Ceballos firing home.

Here are our player ratings.
